pageTitle: URBANIMMERSIVE TECHNOLOGIES (UI:Venture): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10358=Urbanimmersive Technologies Inc., Annual General Meeting, Apr 30, 2015., at 10:00 US Eastern Standard Time. Location: 3899, Autoroute des Laurentides. Agenda: To consider and receive the annual financial report of the Corporation for the financial year ended September 30, 2014, together with the independent auditors report; to elect directors for the ensuing year; to appoint auditors and to authorize the directors of the Corporation to fix their remuneration; and to transact such other business as may properly be brought before the Meeting., 9180=Urbanimmersive Technologies Inc. reported unaudited consolidated earnings results for the second quarter and six months ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported net loss and comprehensive loss of $185,014 or $0.01 per basic and diluted common share on revenue of $205,527 compared to net loss and comprehensive loss of $498,939 or $0.03 per basic and diluted common share on revenue of $201,969 a year ago. For the six months, the company reported net loss and comprehensive loss of $220,108 or $0.01 per basic and diluted common share on revenue of $571,103 compared to net loss and comprehensive loss of $966,183 or $0.06 per basic and diluted common share on revenue of $355,573 a year ago. This increase in revenues is mainly due to the contract for APCHQ real estate portal for the amount of $200,000., 8372=Urbanimmersive Technologies Inc. announced that Alexandre Henry-Lebel, who joined the company in 2013, is appointed Chief Technology Officer of Urbanimmersive Technologies. Martin Thibault is appointed as Interim Chief Financial Officer. Mr. Thibault is Chief Operating Officer of company since 2012 and has the experience and knowledge for his new role. He will continue to act as COO.}
